TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 针对特定的浏览器请求，自定义与此控件适配器关联的 对象的行为。

span.span: Customizes the behavior of a object with which this control adapter is associated, for specific browser requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类进行适应性调整关联控件以修改默认标记或特定浏览器的行为。The class adapts the associated control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser. 您可以扩展类，以进一步自定义呈现的控件。You can extend the class to further customize rendering of the control. 一个控件绑定到数据源，并生成它的用户界面 （或子控件层次结构，通常），通过枚举它绑定到数据源中的项。A control is bound to a data source and generates its user interface (or child control hierarchy, typically), by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound. 分层数据绑定控件的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on hierarchical data-bound controls, see . 为特定的浏览器控件的生命周期中管理一个或多个阶段的控件适配器是一些.net 组件。Control adapters are.NET components that manage one or more stages in the life cycle of a control for a specific browser. 扩展类提供的生命周期阶段对访问控件。Extending the class provides access to the life-cycle stages of the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述自适应控件行为的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff). 适配器在最初请求会导致.NET Framework 映射的适配器进行控制，搜索给定请求的浏览器的特征。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 通过使用浏览器定义文件类，以识别客户端浏览器的特征并将该适配器映射到浏览器类型。Browser definition files are used by the class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何扩展类来呈现的分层绑定到控件对象。The following code example shows how to extend the class to render a hierarchical control that is bound to an object. 此代码示例包含四个对象：This code example contains four objects: - 适配器派生自类。An adapter derived from the class. - .Aspx 文件，其中包含控件和特定于设备的内容。The .aspx file that incorporates the control and device-specific content. - 要链接到设备类型的适配器的浏览器文件。A browser file to link the adapter to a device type. - 包含雇员的分层列表的 XML 文件。An XML file that contains a hierarchical list of employees. 此代码示例由四个代码段组成。This code example consists of four code segments. 第一个代码段演示如何扩展类。The first code segment demonstrates how to extend the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#1)] 第二个代码段演示如何声明将绑定到 XML 数据源。The second code segment demonstrates how to declare a to bind to an XML data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/implcs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/implvb.aspx#4)] 第三个代码段演示了如何链接到适用于 Windows CE 上运行的浏览器的自定义适配器的控件。The third code segment shows how to link the control to the custom adapter for browsers running on Windows CE. 最后一个代码段提供的 XML 数据控件绑定到。The final code segment provides the XML data that the control binds to.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 构造的一个实例类。The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the class. 适配器在最初请求会导致.NET 框架搜索给定请求的浏览器的特征的控件的映射适配器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 找到相应的适配器后，该控件保存到中的映射的适配器实例的引用其属性。After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Control As HierarchicalDataBoundControl

summary.span: 检索对与此 对象关联的 控件的强类型引用。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the control associated with this object.

value.span: 与 的当前实例关联的 。

span.span: The associated with the current instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对相应的控件，包括其属性和方法的访问。The property provides access to the corresponding control, including its properties and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性来检索强类型化控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property to retrieve a strongly typed control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformDataBinding() cil managed
abstract member PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit override this.PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将关联的分层数据绑定控件的数据源中的数据绑定到适配器。

span.span: Binds the data in the data source of the associated hierarchical data-bound control to the adapter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将在指定的数据源关联的数据绑定控制对对象。The method binds the data in the specified data source of the associated control to the object. 您可以重写替换为关联的标准数据绑定功能控制或提供其他数据绑定功能，如果关联已扩展控件。You can override to replace the standard data-binding functionality of the associated control or to provide additional data-binding functionality if the associated control has been extended. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以验证属性将设置在调用父之前方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to verify the property has been set prior to calling the parent method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#2)]
